title: Trump calls on DOJ to probe Democrats tied to Epstein
shortDescription: Trump's call came after House Democrats released emails in which Epstein, a convicted sex offender, alleged the president "knew about the girls."

title: Trump's next immigration crackdown is in North Carolina
shortDescription: The latest city bracing for the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown is Charlotte, North Carolina, which could see an influx of federal agents as early as this weekend, a county sheriff said Thursday.

title: Trump administration seeks new restrictions on foreign students, media
shortDescription: The department received more than 20,000 comments on the proposed rule. Experts said there's no telling if or when it could make a final decision.

title: What is Trump's state approval ratings in New Jersey and Virginia?
shortDescription: Democrats won big in Virginia, New Jersey. What is Donald Trump's approval rating in those states? What is his approval rating overall? What to know.

title: New Jersey Gov.-elect tells Congress she will resign 'next week'
shortDescription: New Jersey Gov.-elect Mikie Sherrill announced during a House session that she will resign her seat representing the 11th District.

title: Trump says deal could lower prices of bananas, coffee for Americans
shortDescription: The Trump administration reached trade deals with Guatemala and Ecuador, hoping the agreements would lower prices for Americans.

title: Four Republicans helped force a vote on Epstein files. Who are they?
shortDescription: In the House, a discharge petition to force a vote on the Epstein files reached 218 signatures. Here's which Republicans joined Democrats in the push.

title: 'I am the one able to take him down.' What Epstein said about Trump.
shortDescription: A USA TODAY review of a trove of Epstein emails shows the convicted sex offender had significant concerns about his longtime friend and confidant.

title: ¿Qué revelan los correos de Epstein? Crece debate mientras Trump presiona
shortDescription: Nuevos correos de Epstein mencionan a Trump y reavivan pedidos para divulgar todos los archivos mientras el Congreso se prepara para una votación clave.

title: Democrats more energized for 2026 than GOP, poll says
shortDescription: In a new Reuters/Ipsos poll, Democrats were more energized about 2026 elections. But the party is still polling behind on a key voter issue.

title: Trump, Epstein 'Best Friends Forever' statue back on display in DC
shortDescription: A political art installation pointing to the relationship between Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein is back on display in DC after an eventful debut.

title: Epstein mentions Trump in emails about Thanksgiving plans in 2017
shortDescription: In email exchange about his plans for Thanksgiving in 2017, convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein mentioned Donald Trump. Here's what he said.

title: $10K in baby food? Epstein said he lost bet to Trump
shortDescription: Emails released by congressional Democrats show the late accused sex trafficker said he lost a bet to then-citizen Donald Trump.

title: Forget Schumer and Pelosi. Zohran Mamdani is Republicans' new foil.
shortDescription: The National Republican Congressional Committee plans to "Make Mamdani and his policies the face of the Democratic Party," in the 2026 elections.

title: Epstein email mentions Trump but Democrats, GOP dispute what it means
shortDescription: Democrats highlight Jeffrey Epstein emails mentioning Trump, but the president and GOP lawmakers deny the messages mean he knew about misconduct
